Open the RStudio project for a book club

Source: R/project-loading.R
club.Rd

Open the RStudio project for a book club

Usage

club(club, new_session = TRUE)

Arguments

club

The abbreviation for the club.

new_session

Whether to open the project in a new RStudio session.

Value

Called for side effects. Probably something invisibly.
